response.overview: Vit√≥ria and her children were forced to flee after their village was violently attacked. They reunite with her son Momade and his family in a camp for displaced people in Cabo Delgado, northern Mozambique. The little they had was left behind in the flight. Through perseverance, song and love they try to overcome the consequences of years of conflict, psicological trauma and harsh living conditions. Now they have to build a new home together.
response.title: We Saw Fire
